short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily create shoppable links to your favorite brands and products.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mavely is the Everyday Influencer Platform™ that earns you cash when people shop what you share.

As you browse thousands of the world’s most loved brands, create a shoppable SmartLink to share with friends, family, and followers. When they shop, you earn commission and bonuses.

It’s simple to create a SmartLink using the Mavely Link Creator Browser Extension.

     1. Sign in or sign up for Mavely
     2. Browse thousands of Mavely brand partners online
     3. Click the extension to create a SmartLink you can share

Mavely SmartLink technology tracks every click and sale, earning you more commission by optimizing a buyer’s path to purchase.

Increase clicks and sales even more by customizing how your audience views your links, with the ability to choose images, titles, and descriptions. Organize your links into folders so it’s simple to share collections later.
